name: Notice, contents; affidavit
text:
(a)  The notice of intention of foreclosure shall contain:
     (1)  A description of the mortgaged property; and
     (2)  A statement of the time and place proposed for the sale thereof at any time after the expiration of four weeks from the date when first advertised.
     (b)  The affidavit described under section 667-5 may lawfully be made by any person duly authorized to act for the mortgagee, and in such capacity conducting the foreclosure. [L 1890, c 9, §1; am L 1915, c 121, §2; RL 1925, §2880; RL 1935, §4725; RL 1945, §12425; RL 1955, §336-6; HRS ; am L 2008, c 138, §2]
 
Case Notes
 
  Mortgagee may act by someone duly authorized.  8 H. 108.
